title: AI-Based Virtual Tour Project for Improving English Proficiency in Tourism Vocational High Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and foundational knowledge of tourism
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment utilizing AI-driven virtual tours reflecting real-world scenarios related to the tourism guide profession

learning_goals: Students can enhance tourism-related English conversational skills (guidance, explanation, response) using AI virtual tours.
Students can apply English communication skills in a simulated environment resembling real-world tourism settings.

Students perform English pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary exercises (10+ sentences per session) twice weekly for six months using an AI real-time feedback system, achieving a 20% improvement in pronunciation accuracy, 30% reduction in grammatical errors, and 15% increase in lexical diversity compared to initial diagnostic assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
